thread.title: My Son Told Me He Hates Me and I'm Okay With That
thread.title_full: My Son Told Me He Hates Me and I'm Okay With That

title: My Son Told Me He Hates Me and I'm Okay With That
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Parents - Today 
Well, it's official. My third son officially told me he hates me for the first time this week. I walked past a gelato shop without giving in...
